item.description: FurryTails | Is Your Cat Overweight? Top Strategies and Practical Tips to Boost Their Activity When you notice that your cat is overweight, increasing their activity level is crucial.

item.title: FurryTails|Why Do Cats Love Hiding in Small Spaces? Understanding Their Instincts
item.description: FurryTails | Why Do Cats Love Hiding in Small Spaces? Understanding Their Natural Instincts Introduction Have you ever wondered where your cat has disappeared to, only to find them in a small, obscure space like a cardboard box, a closet, or even a pot?

item.title: FurryTails|Can Cats Eat Seafood? Debunking Myths About Cats Eating Seafood
item.description: FurryTails | Can Cats Eat Seafood? Debunking Myths About Cats Eating Seafood Introduction Growing up, we often saw cats in cartoons happily munching on fish.
